name: Alexa Criscuolo Bonilla
education: Edinburgh Napier University - Master of Science (MS) in International Event and Festival Management (2013 - 2014)
Arizona State University - BS in Tourism Development and Management, Special Event Management (2009 - 2013)

experience.description: At Creative Riff our vision is "Go Beyond," which is embodied in everything we do from client services, to creative direction, to best in class production. In every project, we build immersive worlds and experiences that surpass expectations.

- Provided activation support for clients in industries ranging from entertainment to economics.
- Addressed client needs from pre-production through execution and post-production.
- Created and maintained client facing materials including decks, budgets and project plans.
- Sourced and managed local vendors.
- Key clients include: FX Networks, Ford Motor Company, WeWork

experience.company: Food Network New York City Wine & Food Festival
